name: If I Die (Working title)
description:
THIS IS A PROTOTYPE PLEASE BE KIND!

STILL LOOKING FOR ARTISTS IF THERE ARE ANY VOLUNTEERS!

The desperate struggle when you try to fight your own mind. Your try and fight to control the aspects of your being that are threatening to control you. Talk to your emotions as you attempt to find out they are hiding from you and uncover the events that lead to you being locked in the eternal hell of your own insecurities. Try and control them and it may not go very well, but what other choice do you have?

A roguelike story-driven adventure - shout your way to freedom.

PLEASE READ THE DEVLOG TO FIND OUT THE QUIRKS OF THE CURRENT BUILDS
